title: Last Season Dia IV Adc LF for High plat- Dia Team [GER|EN]
body:
- 20 y/o
- German|English
-Adc Main
-Teamranked experience

Hey guys,

Im looking for a Team to play flex and tournaments with and in general enjoy the game as a team. I have long teamranked experience and would like to play in one again :)
I havent played much this season (but i am up to date and my mechanics are quite fine again, since i have played a min of games over the whole season)- just started a few weeks ago playing a lot again.
You guys should be semi-serious so its not too strict and all but not too lame at the same time too.
As said in the title you guys should all be high plat to low diamond or higher, since this is where I stopped playing and aim to get to again ;)

If interested add: "Knooti" (main acc)

Proof (last season dia IV): http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=Tjark1 - 2nd Account

Greetings Albert
